lead_paragraph: And now, the only poll that counts.
snippet: After weeks of hand-shaking, debates, campaign advertisements and mailers and fund-raisers, voters now get the chance to tell candidates what they think.

headline.main: At Long Last, the Day Is Here! Run to the Polls!

abstract: After weeks of hand-shaking, debates, campaign advertisements and mailers and fund-raisers, voters now get the chance to tell candidates what they think.
